channel.title: Octopres 3.0 on Niels Berglund
channel.description: Recent content in Octopres 3.0 on Niels Berglund

item.title: Testing, Testing, Anyone Out There?
item.description: What can I say, I am crap at this “blogging” thing! Three years ago, I resuscitated my blog, after a hiatus of one year. I also switched blog engine from WordPress to OctoPress (which at that stage was version 2). At the time of the switch, I had had a one year hiatus of blogging (I am not a very prolific blog writer :)), and I remember I was very tempted to write in that post, that if I cannot keep up blogging I will quit. Boy, am I glad I did not write that!
